actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor

actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on Education and Labor. Report No: 97-701.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 363 - 0 (Record Vote No: 253).
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution disapproving certain regulations submitted to the Congress on July 29, 1982, with respect to the Education Consolidation and Improvement Act of 1981.

summary.text: Disapproves regulations submitted to the Congress on July 29, 1982, by the Secretary of Education which revised certain parts of the Code of Federal Regulations with respect to the Education Consolidation and Improvement Act of 1981.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution disapproving certain regulations submitted to the Congress on July 29, 1982, with respect to the Education Consolidation and Improvement Act of 1981.
